descriptions.projectpedia: Multiple projects sharing and collaboration network (french)
descriptions.globalwiki: Project that groups multiple external wiki into one big
descriptions.tysonfans: Fans group that want to give support to Tyson Tan for his hard work (french)
descriptions.mpcms: Software to help beginners making their own websites fast and without any knowledge (french)
descriptions.bugs: Report and fix bugs about Minteck Projects' different services

restart.title: Restart Required
restart.message: Your need to restart the app to apply the new settings.

debug.title: Attach Debugger
debug.message: You must now attach a debugger to the app. Press Ctrl+Shift+I to open the internal debugger.
debug.messagemac: You must now attach a debugger to the app. Press Cmd+Shift+I to open the internal debugger.

ddebug.title: Debugging
ddebug.message: Debugger detached from app. The app will now restart in #

adebug.title: Debugging
adebug.message: Debugger attached to app. Run the continueSetup function to continue normal startup.

exit.title: Quit
message: now, you'll be disconnected if you're connected to an account, and you'll lose any unsaved changes. Are you sure to continue?

external.title: redirects to an external website
message: tries to redirect you to an external website. You can open it in your default browser if you think it's safe, or cancel and continue on

offline.title: Unable to connect
offline.message: Either the website you try to access is temporarily unavailable, or your device isn't connected to Internet. Check your Internet connection, Minteck Projects services status, and if you use a proxy server or a virtual private network, check that it allows to connect to this website.

update.title: Update available
update.message: An update is available for this software, go to Minteck Projects' website to download the new install wizard. We remind you that using an old version of the Minteck Projects app can expose your device to important security issues, and may prevent you from accessing the websites if you won't update the app.
update.messageFiles: An update is available for this software, go to Minteck Projects' website to download files from the repository. We remind you that using an old version of the Minteck Projects app can expose your device to important security issues, and may prevent you from accessing the websites if you won't update the app.

settingshome.title: Settings
settingshome.desc: Change application configuration to customize your experience

about.updates: A new app version is available, run the install wizard to install it.
about.updatesFiles: A new app version is available, download the files from the repository to install it.
copyright: Minteck Projects WebSpace Desktop, a native app to access Minteck Projects websites

loadetc.free: This software isn't a paid software. If you paid to get it, you got scam and need to ask a refund...
loadetc.copyright: This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

settings.title: WebSpace Desktop settings
settings.autosave: Settings are saved automatically, you'll need to restart the app to apply new settings
settings.telemetry-desc: Allow collecting anonymous statistics and error reports to improve the app and the performance.
settings.gpu-desc: Use your GPU to show blur effects in the app. Enabling this can have significant performance impact or make the app unstable.
settings.debug-desc: Shows additional tools is the « Edit » menu, shows debugging details on the screen and waits for a debugger to attach to continue.

snapcraft.aboutUpdates: A new app version is available, go to the Snap Store to install it.
snapcraft.startUpdates: An update is available for this software, go to the Snap Store to automatically install it. We remind you that using an old version of the Minteck Projects app can expose your device to important security issues, and may prevent you from accessing the websites while you won't update the app.

tutorial.pc: Hover on (or touch) the title bar to show application menu
tutorial.mac: Hover on the title bar to show application menu
